title: Aníbal Fernández - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet: Aníbal Domingo Fernández (born January 9, 1957) is an Argentine politician, public accountant and lawyer affiliated and militant of the Justicialist Party, Since 2021 to 2023, he has served as Argentina's Minister of Security, in the cabinet of Alberto Fernández.

title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: During Kirchner’s government ... he was assigned as minister of justice, security and human rights. Fernández received a degree in public accounting from Universidad Nacional de Lomas and later graduated as a lawyer from the same institution.
